summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the case US v. Maxwell (20 Cr. 330). It transmits a letter and exhibits concerning proposed redactions to defense reply briefs and exhibits, filed on the Electronic Case Filing (ECF) system.

events.title: Filing of Redaction Letter in Maxwell Case
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office files a letter and exhibits on ECF regarding proposed redactions to the defense's reply briefs and exhibits in US v. Maxwell.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is procedural correspondence from April 20, 2021, regarding the criminal case US v. Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
The U.S. Attorney's Office (AUSA Christian Everdell) is communicating with Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team about redactions to defense reply briefs.
The defense team recipients include attorneys Laura Menninger, Jeff Pagliuca, Mark S. Cohen, and Bobbi C Sternheim.
The correspondence indicates ongoing pre-trial litigation and motion practice concerning the sealing or redaction of sensitive material.
The communication originated from the U.S. Attorney's Office at One St. Andrew's Plaza in New York, NY.
